overview_of_class: Produce a range of journalism stories across a variety of forms and platforms: writing for print and digital outlets as well as creating audio, video, apps and interactive graphics. You will also learn how to amplify your storytelling by tapping into social media tools to reach, attract and interact with a wider audience. This class is conducted in a collaborative atmosphere within a newsroom environment to produce stories prepared for the digital age. You will develop a strong sense of journalistic news judgment and be prepared to learn advanced areas of reporting and storytelling in future classes.
name: Journalistic Storytelling Across Media
title: DOHA JOUR 201-0-70 Journalistic Storytelling Across Media
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: NUQ: Students who have completed JOUR 202-0, sophomors and above, Journalism majors only
